alert.note: Alert for Yadkin (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:23PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Yadkin County through 345 PM EDT... At 322 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Courtney, or near Yadkinville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Yadkinville... Courtney... Huntsville... Lone Hickory... and Shacktown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
